inclusion.criterion: Patient with advanced cancer (local recurrence or metastatic) at the time of their follow up visit to the outpatient palliative care clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Either patient or family member can not complete the assessments independently
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Either patient or family member refuses to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto disease, but no other relevant information is provided.
